author: Daniele Francini
description: Raspberry flavours characterise this cognac sour which is served crusta-style.
name: Excuse My French
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
